disableModule(address,address).code: function disableModule(address prevModule, address module) external nonpayable

prevModule.description: Address that pointed to the module to be removed in the linked list

disableModule(address,address).notice: Can only be called by the avatar.Must emit DisabledModule(address module) if successful.
disableModule(address,address).details: Disables a module on the avatar.

enableModule(address).notice: Can only be called by the avatar.Modules should be stored as a linked list.Must emit EnabledModule(address module) if successful.
enableModule(address).details: Enables a module on the avatar.

execTransactionFromModule(address,uint25.code: function execTransactionFromModule(address to, uint256 value, bytes data, enum Enum.Operation operation) external nonpayable returns (bool success)

operation.description: Operation type of module transaction: 0 == call, 1 == delegate call.

execTransactionFromModule(address,uint25.notice: Can only be called by an enabled module.Must emit ExecutionFromModuleSuccess(address module) if successful.Must emit ExecutionFromModuleFailure(address module) if unsuccessful.
execTransactionFromModule(address,uint25.details: Allows a Module to execute a transaction.

execTransactionFromModuleReturnData(addr.code: function execTransactionFromModuleReturnData(address to, uint256 value, bytes data, enum Enum.Operation operation) external nonpayable returns (bool success, bytes returnData)

operation.description: Operation type of module transaction: 0 == call, 1 == delegate call.

execTransactionFromModuleReturnData(addr.notice: Can only be called by an enabled module.Must emit ExecutionFromModuleSuccess(address module) if successful.Must emit ExecutionFromModuleFailure(address module) if unsuccessful.
execTransactionFromModuleReturnData(addr.details: Allows a Module to execute a transaction and return data

getModulesPaginated(address,uint256).code: function getModulesPaginated(address start, uint256 pageSize) external view returns (address[] array, address next)

pageSize.description: Maximum number of modules that should be returned.

isModuleEnabled(address).code: function isModuleEnabled(address module) external view returns (bool)

_0.description: True if the module is enabled

isModuleEnabled(address).details: Returns if an module is enabled
